content.body: Ecma maintains a number of "standards for standards", and [TR-18 (The Meaning of Conformance to Standards, 1st Edition, 1983)](https://ecma-international.org/wp-content/uploads/ECMA_TR-18_1st_edition_september_1983.pdf) is one of the more interesting ones. h/t @akirose:matrix.org
content.formatted_body: Ecma maintains a number of "standards for standards", and TR-18 (The Meaning of Conformance to Standards, 1st Edition, 1983) is one of the more interesting ones. h/t @Aki
